Delete:
always @(posedge clk) begin
  if (resetn == 1'b0) begin
    idle <= 1'b1;
  end else begin
    if (m_sync_valid == 1'b1 && m_sync_ready == 1'b1) begin
    end else if (s0_cmd_valid == 1'b1 || s1_cmd_valid == 1'b1) begin
      idle <= 1'b0;
end
Add:
always @(posedge clk) begin
    if (resetn == 1'b0) begin
    end else begin
      if (m_sync_valid == 1'b1 && m_sync_ready == 1'b1) begin
        idle <= 1'b1;
      end else if (s0_cmd_valid == 1'b1 || s1_cmd_valid == 1'b1) begin
        idle <= 1'b0;
      end
